title: Art Walk
description:
Join the Evening Associates at Art Walk and explore galleries open late just for you. Follow a custom route through the River North neighborhood, experiencing a wide variety of art from around the world, including sculpture, ceramics, prints, paintings, photography, and installation art. Top this special night with an after-party at Bounce Sporting Club.

Galleries:

Addington Gallery
Andrew Bae Gallery
Catherine Edelman Gallery
ECHT Gallery
Gallery Victor Armendariz
Hilton-Asmus Contemporary
Jean Albano Gallery
Ken Saunders Gallery
Zg Gallery

Event co-chairs: Alexandra Demers and Tarra Sharp

Proceeds from Art Walk support the Evening Associates’ mission to fund exhibitions at the Art Institute devoted to today's emerging artists. Attendees must be 21+, and valid ID is required upon entry.

Follow the Evening Associates on Facebook for the latest news and other events. @ArtInstitueEA
buy_button_caption: $15 Evening Associates, $25 members and students, $35 adults
